Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Lobby
  • public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
    Waiting lobby in which players are put before entering in a match (or create one)

      • createMatch

        public MatchController createMatch​(LobbyController lobby,
                                   PlayerConnection host,
                                   int maxPlayers,
                                   int maxDeaths,
                                   int turnDuration,
                                   int mapID)
                            throws TooManyPlayersException,
                                   MatchAlreadyStartedException,
                                   PlayerAlreadyExistsException,
                                   TooManyMatchesException,
                                   PlayerNotExistsException
        Create and add a new match to the lobby
        Parameters:
        lobby - lobby controller to pass to match
        host - player hosting the match
        maxPlayers - for the game
        maxDeaths - for the game
        turnDuration - in seconds
        mapID - of the map to play
        Returns:
        Controller to new match
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersException
        MatchAlreadyStartedException
        PlayerAlreadyExistsException
        TooManyMatchesException
        PlayerNotExistsException

      • joinMatch

        public void joinMatch​(Player player,
                      MatchController toJoin)
               throws TooManyPlayersException,
                      MatchAlreadyStartedException,
                      PlayerAlreadyExistsException,
                      PlayerNotExistsException
        Add player to match
        Parameters:
        player - that joins
        toJoin - match that is joined
        Throws:
        TooManyPlayersException - if match is full
        MatchAlreadyStartedException - if match already started
        PlayerAlreadyExistsException - if player already inside toJoin
        PlayerNotExistsException - if player is not in lobby
